Address.description:
Information about a unique location for 1) a physical or geographical location or 2) an Internet or IP address. 

Information about the place where a person or organization can be found or communicated with

Address Category.description: Information about the use of an address, such as business, residential.

City.description: Information about the residence city of a passenger party

Country.description: Information about the residence country of a passenger party

County.description: Information about the residence country of a passenger party

Number.description: Information about the unique number of the address. It could be a house number or e-mail address

Post Code.description: Information about the residence post code or zip code of a passenger party

Province.description: Information about the residence province of a passenger party

State.description: Information about the residence state of a passenger party

Street.description: Information about the residence street of a passenger party

Aircraft Movement.description: Information relating to planned or spontaneous change in location or movement of an Aircraft which is of interest to Heathrow Airport

Actual Time Of Arrival.description: ATA. The actual time of arrival of an inbound flight

Actual Time Of Departure.description: ATD. The actual time of departure for an outbound flight

Aircarft Terminal.description: Terminal where the aircraft is located.

Airline Party Identifier.description: The Airline number that may be combined with the Flight number as proposed in the IATA standards

Code.description: A business defined code assigned to the movement

Departure Date.description: Information about the date of departure of a flight ( type of aircraft movement)

Description.description: Free text

Duration.description: The estimated flight duration time (the time  from off blocks to block time).

End Date.description: Information about the end date of the movement

IATA Identifier.description: Information about the IATA identification code for the flight. It is a combination of the IATA Identifier for the Airline and Flight Number

IATA Number.description: Information about the IATA number for the flight

ICAO Identifier.description: The ICAO identification for the flight. A single alphanumeric string giving an ICAO compliant representation of the main Flight Identifier. This will include a 3 character ICAO carrier code, flight number stripped of leading zeroes where necessary and an optional suffix character. Most flights using BAA Airports use IATA Flight Identifiers but certain users such as Air Traffic Control may wish to see information presented in ICAO format and such users can be shown the contents of this element rather than the main Flight Identifier.

ICAO Number.description: Information about the  ICAO number for the flight.

Scheduled Time.description: Informationn about the scheduled time for the flight

Scheduled Time Of Arrival.description: Information about the scheduled date and time of arrival (STA) for an outbound flight (always UTC unless explicitly used within a public container such as with Advance Passenger Information).

Scheduled Time Of Departure.description: Information about the scheduled date and time of departure (STD) for an outbound flight (always UTC unless explicitly used within a public container such as with Advance Passenger Information).

Start Date.description: Information about the start date of the flight. The scheduled flight origin date based on the flight not the flight leg.  This date must not change once intialized in an AIDX message.

Aircraft Movement Status.description: Information that describes the condition of a flight based on the values of its attributes

Description.description: Information that describes the condition or status of a flight

Identifier.description: Information that identifies the condition or status of a flight

Name.description: Information about the business name for the flight status

Airline Party.description: Information about an organisation that operates scheduled flights utilising Aircrafts as resources

Contact.description: Information about the  Airline contact details - telephone, email, etc

Country.description: Information that describes the country of registration of the Airline

Description.description: Information that describes the Airline

IATA Identifier.description: Information about a unique identifier assigned by ICAO to identify the Airline

ICAO Identifer.description: Information about a unique identifier assigned by ICAO to identify the Airline

Operational Location.description: Information that describes the operational base location of the Airline

Type.description: Information about the  type of Airline - Marketing or Operating Airline

Airline Party Information Request.description: A subset of Airline information requested by a Passenger

Description.description: Information that describes the Airline information

Identifier.description: Information that identifies the Airline data

Airport Facility.description: Information about a building or infrastructure used to provide a air transport service.

Arrival Airport.description: Information about the destination of flights

Capacity.description: Information about the maximum capacity level of the Airport

Description.description: Information about the description of the Airport

Embarkation Airport.description: Information about the Airport where the Passenger boarded the flight

Type.description: Information about the  subdivision of the Airport facilities involved in the provision of services

Airport Facility Information Request.description: A subset of information requested by the passenger that describes the Airport. Examples include security waiting times and information on lost items

Description.description: Information that describes the Airport information

Identifier.description: Information that identifies the Airport information

Application.description: Information about the software components that deliver information services to a person or other software components

Description.description: Information that describes an application

System.description: Information that describes the system that hosts the application

Bag Item.description: A bag is a logistic item owned by the passenger but transported and managed by the Airline and Airports.

Cabin Class.description: Information about a logistic item that indicates the travel class category of the owner as assigned by the Airline. It may also be known as the passenger class of a bag. This information is unique to every airline.

Check-in Date.description: Information about the date that the bag was identified at a check in desk.

Check-in Location.description: Information that describes the location where the check-in event for the bag occurred.

Check-in Time.description: Information about the time that the bag was identified at a check in desk.

Checked Weight.description: Information that describes the checked weight of a logistic item

Description.description: Information that describes the bag

Format Code.description: Format code for Boarding pass issued, can only be M for Multiple, see Reso 792

Global Unique Identifier.description: Information about an identifier assigned by the business to a logistic item which is unique throughout the entire item management process

Handler.description: Information about the handling agent associated with the logistic item.

Height.description: Information about the height physical dimension of a logistic item.

Identifier.description: Information that identifies the bag for example the bag tag

Length.description: Information about the length physical dimension of the bag

Number.description: Information about the document number that identifies the bag.

Owner.description: Information about the owner of the bag

Reclaim Location.description: Information about the reclaim location for the bag

Scan Date.description: Information about the date that a logistic item was scanned

Scan Time.description: Information about the time that a logistic item was scanned

Volume.description: Information about the volume of the bag

Width.description: Information about the measured width of the bag

Bag Item Information Request.description: Information request about passenger bags at the Airport

Bag Item Status.description: Information that describes the condition of a bag based on the values of its attributes

Description.description: Information that describes the condition or state of a bag

Identifier.description: Information that identifies the condition or state of a bag

Name.description: The business name for the status or condition of the bag

Date Time Period.description: The information about the specific day of an event, a type of  (category of) Time.

Day Of The Month.description: Day number within the current month, 1 through 31.

Day Of The Week Name.description: Day of the week, Sunday through Saturday.

Day Of The Week Number.description: Day number within the current week, 1 through 7.

Day Of The Year.description: Day number within the current year, 1 through 366.

Month Numeric.description: Month number in the calendar year, 1 through 12.

Week Number Within Current Month.description: Week number within the current month

Week Number Within Current Year.description: Week number within the current year, 1 through 53 (ie 52+1).

Day Time Period.description: A particular day of the week (Mon-Sun)

Flight Service Bookmark.description: Information about the search results of a query on flight information that may be saved by the passenger

Description.description: Information that describes the bookmark

Location.description: Information about a geographic position, line or area.

Arrival Airport.description: Information about the place or port at which a passenger arrives

Departure Airport.description: Information about the place or port from which a passenger departs

Description.description: The description assigned by the business to the location

Type.description: The list of types of location

Location Type.description: Location type may be Geopolitical or Geospatial.

Geopolitical.description: This is the geopolitical category for a location

Geospatial.description: This is the geospatial category for a location

Lost and Found Item.description: Information about a collection of data and information with identified boundaries. Examples include paper documents and digital / electronic messages

Description.description: Information that describes content.

Format Code.description: Format code for Boarding pass issued, can only be M for Multiple, see Reso 792

Identifier.description: Information about the Identifier of information content e.g. the passport or visa number

Passenger Party.description: Information about individuals, identifiable groups that purchase and use air transport services. Examples include transfer and final destination passengers

Citizenship.description: Information on the status of a citizen with rights and duties

Contact.description: Information about the Party contact Details - telephone, email, etc.

Date Of Birth.description: Information about the date of birth of a party

Description.description: Information that describes the party

Gender.description: Information on the gender of a passenger party

Nationality.description: Information on the status of belonging to a particular nation by birth or naturalisation.

Number.description: A unique number assigned by the business or any other authority to track a Passenger Party.

Place Of Birth.description: Information about the place of birth of a party

Status.description: Information regarding status of passenger. See Resolution 792 attachment C for the values to be used

Passenger Party Credentials.description: Information that describes the certification, privileges and access rights of a passenger. Examples include access privileges provided by the VISA and Passports

Description.description: Information that describes the privileges associated with a certifying document

Identifier.description: Information that identify the privileges associated with a certifying document e.g. the passport or visa number

Privileges.description: detailed information about the commitment and privileges provided by the document

Type.description: Information about the type of passenger credential

Passenger Party Planned Movement.description: A collection of data and information that describes the passenger itinerary.  Examples include final destination, time of arrival etc

Time Of Arrival.description: Information on time of arrival at destination

Weather Condition.description: Information that describes the weather condition at destination of travel

Passenger Party Travel Document.description: Information that identifies a person and the privileges provided by a certification authority including a government agency. Examples include the passport information and other travel documents

Description.description: Information that describes the travel document

Expiry Date.description: Information about the expiry date for the passport or visa

Identifier.description: Information that identifies the travel document

Type.description: Information that describes the type of travel document

Reservation Request.description: Information about the reservation request made by a passenger

Date.description: Information about the date the reservation was made

Description.description: Information that describes the reservation request made by the passenger

Identifier.description: Information that identifies the reservation request made by a passenger

Time.description: Information about the time the reservation was made

Retail Service.description: Information about the products, proposals, expected or agreed duties, functions or activities which BAA offers to other Parties.

Description.description: Information that describes an offering

Security Queue Waiting.description: Information about a collection of data and information with identified boundaries. Examples include paper documents and digital / electronic messages

Description.description: Information that describes content.

Format Code.description: Format code for Boarding pass issued, can only be M for Multiple, see Reso 792

Identifier.description: Information about the Identifier of information content e.g. the passport or visa number

Service.description: Information about the expected or agreed duties, functions or activities which BAA offers to other Parties.

Description.description: The description of the service

IATA Service Type.description: Information about IATA classification codes for Services

Type.description: The type of the service e.g. check-in, security

Service Bookmark.description: Information about the search results of a query on service information that may be saved by the passenger

Description.description: Information that describes the service bookmark

Service Information Request.description: Information request about the collection of business services available at the Airport

Description.description: Information that describe the service information

Service Type.description: This is the type of service provided by a Party

Code.description: Information about the code of the service category

Description.description: Information about the description of the service category

System.description:
Information about instrumentality that combines interrelated interacting artifacts designed to work as a coherent entity.

For example, the expression, "the system consists of a motor and a small computer" indicates that the system comprises of two artefacts.

Description.description: Information that describes a system

Time Period.description: Information about the start and end time for business events of interest to Heathrow Airport.

Date.description: Information about the categories of date items

Day Of the Week.description: Information about the day of the week

Duration.description: It is the difference between the start time and end time, typically in seconds

End.description: The end time of the incident

Start.description: The start time of the incident

Weather Information Request.description: A passenger request for information about the weather condition of interest to the Passenger. This includes the general weather condition and the temperature

Description.description: Information that describes the weather information

Identifier.description: Information that identifies the weather information
